languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} даже на противников, находящихся вне его зоны {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The area of Study Enemies becomes a 20-cell cone that stretches from the Adept in the direction of the target point.
The Adept inflicts an exploit even on enemies which are out of the Adept's line of sight at the start of the turn.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} даже на противников, находящихся вне его зоны {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}.
languages.original_text: The area of Study Enemies becomes a 20-cell cone that stretches from the Adept in the direction of the target point.

traits.locale_text: Область действия Изучения целей принимает форму конуса длиной 20 клеток, направленного от адепта к выбранной точке.
Область действия Изучения целей принимает форму конуса длиной 20 клеток, направленного от адепта к выбранной точке.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，即便敌人不在特工的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内，特工也同样会对其添加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 技师的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，即便敌人不在技师的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内，技师也同样会对其添加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} hasta a aquellos enemigos que no están en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del agente al empezar el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El agente inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} hasta a aquellos enemigos que no están en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del agente al empezar el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}内にいない敵に対しても{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を適用する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいない敵に対しても{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を適用する。

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} belegt zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} auch Gegner außerhalb seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} mit 1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Agent fügt zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} zu, und zwar auch bei Feinden, die sich nicht in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} befinden.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis, y compris à ceux qui se trouvent hors de sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis, y compris à ceux qui se trouvent hors de sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında onun {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} olmasalar bile düşmanlar üzerinde birer {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüye{/g} sebep olur.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
